info.name: Binance spot API
info.description:
Binance official supported Postman collections.
- API documents: https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/spot/en/#change-log - Telegram: https://t.me/binance_api_english - Open Issue at: https://github.com/binance-exchange/binance-api-postman

item.name: Get liquidity information of a pool (USER_DATA)

query.description: SINGLE for single asset removal, COMBINATION for combination of all coins removal
"SINGLE" for adding a single token;"COMBINATION" for adding dual tokens
Type is "SINGLE", remove and obtain a single token;Type is "COMBINATION", remove and obtain dual token.
